content.question: The Federalist papers were written in order to

choices.label: mobilize popular support for keeping the Articles of Confederation
persuade voters to support Thomas Jefferson in the election of 1800
frustrate Spanish efforts to sway the political loyalty of the Southwest
persuade the Continental Congress to declare independence

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
